allow: Bash(claude plugin --help 2>&1 || claude plugins --help 2>&1 || claude --help 2>&1 | head -40)
Bash(claude plugin install --help 2>&1; echo "==="; claude plugin marketplace --help 2>&1)
Bash(claude plugin marketplace list --json 2>&1 || claude plugin marketplace list 2>&1)
Bash(claude plugin marketplace list 2>&1; echo "==="; cat /Users/admin/.claude/plugins/known_marketplaces.json)
Bash(cd /Users/admin/.claude/local-marketplace && git init && git add -A && git commit -m "Initial commit: local plugin marketplace" 2>&1)
Bash(git add -A && git commit -m "Add marketplace manifest and meta-analysis-assistant plugin" 2>&1)
